channel.title: arc on Will's Whims
channel.description: Recent content in arc on Will's Whims

item.title: More better spec for Arc
item.description: A DESCRIBE form now creates a procedure, which, when run, returns a set of results, which can be printed. Also, errors in test forms are caught. See spec.arc Can an HTML format be far behind? It’s not perfect. But parts of it are excellent.

item.title: First experiment with Arc
item.description:
I decided to try to write a simple but useful program in Arc, the programming language recently released by Paul Graham.

One thing I’ve liked about using Ruby is a testing framework called Rspec, in which you describe the behavior of your program in a kind of narrative form. So I decided to try and write a similar system for Arc.

item.title: arc is here
item.description: `` arclanguage.org I should have mentioned: via lemonodor.
